keymaps.name: Colemak for Mac
keymaps.description: Colemak is based on QWERTY, but it places the most frequent letters under the strongest fingers. This is the Mac version.

keymaps.name: Colemak for PC
keymaps.description: Colemak is based on QWERTY, but it places the most frequent letters under the strongest fingers. This is the PC version.

keymaps.name: Empty
keymaps.description: This is an empty keymap. Let's start from scratch!

keymaps.name: QWERTY for Mac
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the Mac version.

keymaps.name: QWERTY for PC
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the PC version.

keymaps.name: QWERTY for PC VIM
keymaps.description: QWERTY is the mother of all layouts. This is the PC version.

macroActions.command:
ifKeyActive leftSuper holdKey R
else ifKeyActive rightSuper holdKey R
else { 
  pressKey leftControl
  delayUntil 100
  tapKey LC-mouseBtnLeft
  delayUntil 100
  releaseKey leftControl
}
